text.en: Cannot be Special Summoned. You can Tribute Summon this card face-up by Tributing 1 Zombie monster. Gains 200 ATK for every other Zombie monster you control. At the start of your Main Phase 1, if this card, and 2 or more Zombie monsters other than "Daidara-Bocchi", are in your GY: You can discard 1 card; add this card to your hand.
